meanings.definition: The quality of being fashionable or stylish.
meanings.sent1: Her fashionabilities always stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of fashionabilities for all ages.
meanings.sent3: His lack of fashionabilities made him the center of attention at the party.
meanings.sent4: She exudes confidence with her impeccable fashionabilities.
meanings.sent5: The fashionabilities of the celebrities set new trends every season.

meanings.definition: Items or trends that are currently popular in clothing or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The fashionabilities displayed in the window caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: Fashionabilities like ripped jeans come and go in cycles.
meanings.sent3: The fashionabilities of the 80s are making a comeback.
meanings.sent4: Her closet is filled with the latest fashionabilities.
meanings.sent5: The fashionabilities of the runway inspire designers worldwide.
